entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Friday 17 March 2023
